parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name> game2</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name> version2</name>=<value> 1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Destroys the given rope. If the rope is attached to a vehicle, it will be detached and then destroyed.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropeDestroy]] rope

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> rope: [[Object]] - rope object returned by [[ropeCreate]] command

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ropeDestroy]] myRope;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeSetCargoMass]], [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]]
</value></part></template>
